content:
Something that I realised in the "diagnostics around for<'a>" topic, I think it'd be nicer if we had a single note that was wrapped inteliigently rather than multiple notes when we have a long message:

ie. IMO, I prefer this:

   = note: lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. nam ante orci, auctor vitae
           aliquet vitae, feugiat ut mi. mauris ultrices placerat enim at pulvinar. nam nibh quam, blandit
           eget quam mollis, maximus ultrices ante.

Over this:

   = note: lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. nam ante orci, auctor vitae...
   = note:  ...aliquet vitae, feugiat ut mi. mauris ultrices placerat enim at pulvinar. nam nibh quam, blandit...
   = note:  ...eget quam mollis, maximus ultrices ante.
yes, there is definitely a need for the ability to compose more "paragraph-like" things
I miss sometimes the LALRPOP handling for this sort of thing
